DocLocalization.Name: Type d'élément de construction non défini

DocAttribute.Name: PredefinedType
DocAttribute.Documentation: Predefined types to define the particular type of an building element proxy. There may be property set definitions available for each predefined or user defined type.

DocWhereRule.Name: CorrectPredefinedType
DocWhereRule.Documentation: The inherited attribute _ElementType_ shall be provided, if the _PredefinedType_ is set to USERDEFINED.
